channel.title: RSX Type-S on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: I Bought an RSX Type S With a Blown Transmission
item.description: About a month back I was staying at an AirBnB with some buddies for an autocross event when one of them casually mentioned they had a friend with a RSX Type S that had a (potentially) blown transmission just sitting around. They weren’t exactly sure what was wrong with it but the owner wasn’t mechanically inclined and was just looking to get rid of it.
